alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL ECHOLS... SOUTHEASTERN WARE...SOUTHEASTERN CLINCH AND WEST CENTRAL CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fargo, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Fargo and Stephen Foster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
